title: Radiant Philosophy: From Research to Deployable Systems
author: Radiant Group
excerpt: Why Radiant focuses on deployable, grounded, and evaluable AI systems.
content:
## Context
Many AI research projects end as demos. Deployment exposes assumptions that research often ignores.

## Philosophy
Correctness without usability is failure. Accuracy without context is risk.

## Principles
- Systems over models
- Evaluation over intuition
- Transparency over opacity

## Practice
Every Radiant project is designed with deployment in mind from day one.

## Lessons Learned
Engineering discipline enables trustworthy AI.

## Conclusion
Radiant exists where research meets reality.
